00029 SceneGraphFacade::SceneGraphFacade() {
00030         this->idGenerator = new SimpleIdGenerator();
00031         initialize();
00032 }
00033 
00034 SceneGraphFacade::SceneGraphFacade(IIdGenerator* idGenerator) {
00035         assert(idGenerator != 0);
00036         this->idGenerator = idGenerator;
00037         initialize();
00038 }
00039 
00040 SceneGraphFacade::~SceneGraphFacade() {
00041         if (idGenerator) {
00042                 delete idGenerator;
00043                 idGenerator = 0;
00044         }
00045 }
00046 
00047 void SceneGraphFacade::initialize() {
00048         rootNode = Group::GroupPtr(new Group());
00049         rootNode->setId(idGenerator->getRootId());
00050         assert(rootNode->getId() == idGenerator->getRootId());
00051         idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(rootNode->getId(), rootNode));
00052         updateObservers.clear();
00053 }
00054 
00055 unsigned int SceneGraphFacade::getRootId() {
00056         return idGenerator->getRootId();
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool SceneGraphFacade::getNodes(vector<Attribute> attributes, vector<unsigned int>& ids) {
00060         LOG(DEBUG) << " Current idLookUpTable lenght = " << idLookUpTable.size();
00061         ids.clear();
00062         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(getRootId());
00063         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00064         if (node != 0) {
00065                         AttributeFinder attributeFinder;
00066                         attributeFinder.setQueryAttributes(attributes);
00067                         node->accept(&attributeFinder);
00068                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(attributeFinder.getMatchingNodes().size()) ; ++i) {
00069                                 ids.push_back((*attributeFinder.getMatchingNodes()[i]).getId());
00070                         }
00071 
00072                 return true;
00073         }
00074         LOG(ERROR) << "Cannot find root node. Aborting attribute search.";
00075         return false;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool SceneGraphFacade::getNodeAttributes(unsigned int id, vector<Attribute>& attributes) {
00079         attributes.clear();
00080         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00081         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00082         if (node != 0) {
00083                 if (node != 0) {
00084                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(node->getAttributes().size()) ; ++i) {
00085                                 attributes.push_back(node->getAttributes()[i]);
00086                         }
00087                 }
00088                 return true;
00089         }
00090         return false;
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool SceneGraphFacade::getNodeParents(unsigned int id, vector<unsigned int>& parentIds) {
00094         parentIds.clear();
00095         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00096         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00097         if (node != 0) {
00098                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < node->getNumberOfParents(); ++i) {
00099                         parentIds.push_back(node->getParent(i)->getId());
00100                 }
00101                 return true;
00102         }
00103         return false;
00104 }
00105 
00106 bool SceneGraphFacade::getGroupChildren(unsigned int id, vector<unsigned int>& childIds) {
00107         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00108         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00109         Group::GroupPtr group = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Group>(node);
00110         if (group != 0) {
00111                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < group->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i) {
00112                         childIds.push_back(group->getChild(i)->getId());
00113                 }
00114                 return true;
00115         }
00116         LOG(ERROR) << "Node with ID " << id << " is not a group. Cannot return child IDs";
00117         return false;
00118 }

00120 bool SceneGraphFacade::getTransform(unsigned int id, TimeStamp timeStamp, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr& transform) {
00121         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00122         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00123         rsg::Transform::TransformPtr transformNode = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<rsg::Transform>(node);
00124         if (transformNode != 0) {
00125                 transform = transformNode->getTransform(timeStamp);
00126                 return true;
00127         }
00128         LOG(ERROR) << "Node with ID " << id << " is not a transform. Cannot return transform data.";
00129         return false;
00130 }

00132 bool SceneGraphFacade::getGeometry(unsigned int id, Shape::ShapePtr& shape, TimeStamp& timeStamp) {
00133         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00134         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00135         GeometricNode::GeometricNodePtr geometricNode = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<GeometricNode>(node);
00136         if (geometricNode != 0) {
00137                 shape = geometricNode->getShape();
00138                 timeStamp = geometricNode->getTimeStamp();
00139                 return true;
00140         }
00141         LOG(ERROR) << "Node with ID " << id << " is not a geometric node. Cannot return shape data.";
00142         return false;
00143 }

00145 bool SceneGraphFacade::getTransformForNode (unsigned int id, unsigned int idReferenceNode, TimeStamp timeStamp, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr& transform) {
00146         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00147         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00148         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpReferenceNode = findNodeRecerence(idReferenceNode);
00149         Node::NodePtr referenceNode= tmpReferenceNode.lock();
00150         if ((node != 0) && (referenceNode != 0)) {
00151 //              transform = getGlobalTransform(node);
00152                 transform = getTransformBetweenNodes(node, referenceNode);
00153                 return true;
00154         }
00155         return false;
00156 }

00159 bool SceneGraphFacade::addNode(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, bool forcedId) {
00160         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00161         bool idIsOk = false;
00162         unsigned int id;
00163         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00164         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00165         Group::GroupPtr parentGroup = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Group>(node);
00166 
00167         if (forcedId) {
00168 //                              Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNodeAlreadyExists = findNodeRecerence(assignedId); //check if id alredy exists in local LookUpTable
00169 //                              Node::NodePtr nodeAlreadyExists = tmpNodeAlreadyExists.lock();
00170                                 if( (!doesIdExist(assignedId)) && (idGenerator->removeIdFromPool(assignedId)) ) {
00171                                         id = assignedId;
00172                                         idIsOk = true;
00173                                 } else {
00174                                         LOG(WARNING) << "Forced ID " << assignedId << " cannot be assigend. Probably another object with that ID exists already!";
00175                                         idIsOk = false;
00176                                 }
00177         } else {
00178                 id = idGenerator->getNextValidId();
00179                 idIsOk = true;
00180         }
00181 
00182         if ((parentGroup != 0) && (idIsOk)) {
00183                 Node::NodePtr newNode(new Node());
00184                 newNode->setId(id);
00185                 newNode->setAttributes(attributes);
00186                 parentGroup->addChild(newNode);
00187                 assignedId = newNode->getId();
00188                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(newNode->getId(), newNode));
00189                 operationSucceeded = true;
00190         }
00191 
00192         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00193         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00194         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00195                 unsigned int assignedIdcopy = assignedId; // prevent that observer might change this....
00196                 (*observerIterator)->addNode(parentId, assignedIdcopy, attributes);
00197         }
00198 
00199         if (operationSucceeded) {
00200                 return true;
00201         } else {
00202                 if (idIsOk) { //If ID was OK but operation did not succeeded, then it is because of the parent...
00203                         LOG(ERROR) << "Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new node as a child of it.";
00204                 }
00205                 return false;
00206         }
00207 }

00218 //                              Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNodeAlreadyExists = findNodeRecerence(assignedId); //check if id alredy exists in local LookUpTable

00224                                         LOG(WARNING) << "Forced ID " << assignedId << " cannot be assigend. Probably another object with that ID exists already!";

00255                 }

00260 bool SceneGraphFacade::addTransformNode(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transform, TimeStamp timeStamp, bool forcedId) {
00261         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00262         bool idIsOk = false;
00263         unsigned int id;
00264         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00265         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00266 
00267         Group::GroupPtr parentGroup = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Group>(node);
00268 
00269         if (forcedId) {
00270 //              Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNodeAlreadyExists = findNodeRecerence(assignedId); //check if id alredy exists in local LookUpTable
00271 //              Node::NodePtr nodeAlreadyExists = tmpNodeAlreadyExists.lock();
00272                 if( (!doesIdExist(assignedId)) && (idGenerator->removeIdFromPool(assignedId)) ) {
00273                         id = assignedId;
00274                         idIsOk = true;
00275                 } else {
00276                         LOG(WARNING) << "Forced ID " << assignedId << " cannot be assigend. Probably another object with that ID exists already!";
00277                         idIsOk = false;
00278                 }
00279         } else {
00280                 id = idGenerator->getNextValidId();
00281                 idIsOk = true;
00282         }
00283 
00284         if ((parentGroup != 0) && (idIsOk)) {
00285                 rsg::Transform::TransformPtr newTransform(new Transform());
00286                 newTransform->setId(id);
00287                 newTransform->setAttributes(attributes);
00288                 newTransform->insertTransform(transform, timeStamp);
00289                 parentGroup->addChild(newTransform);
00290                 assignedId = newTransform->getId();
00291                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(newTransform->getId(), newTransform));
00292                 operationSucceeded = true;
00293         }
00294 
00295         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00296         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00297         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00298                 unsigned int assignedIdcopy = assignedId; // prevent that observer might change this....
00299                 (*observerIterator)->addTransformNode(parentId, assignedIdcopy, attributes, transform, timeStamp);
00300         }
00301 
00302         if(operationSucceeded) {
00303                 return true;
00304         } else {
00305                 if (idIsOk) { //If ID was OK but operation did not succeeded, then it is because of the parent...
00306                         LOG(ERROR) << "Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new transform as a child of it.";
00307                 }
00308                 return false;
00309         }
00310 }

00312 bool SceneGraphFacade::addGeometricNode(unsigned int parentId, unsigned int& assignedId, vector<Attribute> attributes, Shape::ShapePtr shape, TimeStamp timeStamp, bool forcedId) {
00313         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00314         bool idIsOk = false;
00315         unsigned int id;
00316         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00317         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00318         Group::GroupPtr parentGroup = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Group>(node);
00319 
00320         if (forcedId) {
00321 //              Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNodeAlreadyExists = findNodeRecerence(assignedId); //check if id alredy exists in local LookUpTable
00322 //              Node::NodePtr nodeAlreadyExists = tmpNodeAlreadyExists.lock();
00323                 if( (!doesIdExist(assignedId)) && (idGenerator->removeIdFromPool(assignedId)) ) {
00324                         id = assignedId;
00325                         idIsOk = true;
00326                 } else {
00327                         LOG(WARNING) << "Forced ID " << assignedId << " cannot be assigend. Probably another object with that ID exists already!";
00328                         idIsOk = false;
00329                 }
00330         } else {
00331                 id = idGenerator->getNextValidId();
00332                 idIsOk = true;
00333         }
00334 
00335         if ((parentGroup != 0) && (idIsOk)) {
00336                 GeometricNode::GeometricNodePtr newGeometricNode(new GeometricNode());
00337                 newGeometricNode->setId(id);
00338                 newGeometricNode->setAttributes(attributes);
00339                 newGeometricNode->setShape(shape);
00340                 newGeometricNode->setTimeStamp(timeStamp);
00341                 parentGroup->addChild(newGeometricNode);
00342                 assignedId = newGeometricNode->getId();
00343                 idLookUpTable.insert(std::make_pair(newGeometricNode->getId(), newGeometricNode));
00344                 operationSucceeded = true;
00345         }
00346 
00347         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00348         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00349         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00350                 unsigned int assignedIdcopy = assignedId; // prevent that observer might change this....
00351                 (*observerIterator)->addGeometricNode(parentId, assignedIdcopy, attributes, shape, timeStamp);
00352         }
00353 
00354         if(operationSucceeded) {
00355                 return true;
00356         } else {
00357                 if (idIsOk) { //If ID was OK but operation did not succeeded, then it is because of the parent...
00358                         LOG(ERROR) << "Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new geometric node as a child of it.";
00359                 }
00360                 return false;
00361         }
00362 }

00365 bool SceneGraphFacade::setNodeAttributes(unsigned int id, vector<Attribute> newAttributes) {
00366         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00367         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00368         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00369         if (node != 0) {
00370                 node->setAttributes(newAttributes);
00371                 operationSucceeded = true;
00372         }
00373 
00374         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00375         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00376         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00377                 unsigned idCopy = id; // prevent that observer might change this....
00378                 (*observerIterator)->setNodeAttributes(idCopy, newAttributes);
00379         }
00380 
00381         if (operationSucceeded) {
00382                 return true;
00383         } else {
00384                 return false;
00385         }
00386 }

00388 bool SceneGraphFacade::setTransform(unsigned int id, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transform, TimeStamp timeStamp) {
00389         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00390         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00391         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00392         rsg::Transform::TransformPtr transformNode = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<rsg::Transform>(node);
00393         if (transformNode != 0) {
00394                 transformNode->insertTransform(transform, timeStamp);
00395                 operationSucceeded = true;
00396         }
00397 
00398         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00399         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00400         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00401                 (*observerIterator)->setTransform(id, transform, timeStamp);
00402         }
00403 
00404         if (operationSucceeded) {
00405                 return true;
00406         } else {
00407                 LOG(ERROR) << "Node with ID " << id << " is not a transform. Cannot set new transform data.";
00408                 return false;
00409         }
00410 }
00411 
00412 bool SceneGraphFacade::deleteNode(unsigned int id) {
00413         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00414         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00415         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00416         if (node != 0) {
00417                 if (node->getNumberOfParents() == 0) { // oops we are trying to delete the root node, but this on has no parents...
00418                         assert (id == getRootId()); // just to be sure something really strange did not happend...
00419                         LOG(WARNING) << "The root node with ID " << id << " cannot be deleted.";
00420                         operationSucceeded = false;
00421 
00422                 } else {
00423 
00424                         /*
00425                          * so we found the handle to the current node; now we will invoke
00426                          * the according delete function for every parent
00427                          */
00428                         while (node->getNumberOfParents() > 0) { //NOTE: node->getNumberOfParents() will decrease within every iteration...
00429                                 unsigned int i = 0;
00430                                 rsg::Node* parentNode;
00431                                 parentNode = node->getParent(i);
00432                                 Group* parentGroup =  dynamic_cast<Group*>(parentNode);
00433                                 if (parentGroup != 0 ) {
00434                                         parentGroup->removeChild(node);
00435                                 } else {
00436                                         assert(false); // actually parents need to be groups otherwise sth. really went wrong
00437                                 }
00438                         }
00439                         idLookUpTable.erase(id); //erase by ID (if not done here there would be orphaned IDs)
00440                         // TODO: do we have to delete children?
00441                         operationSucceeded = true;
00442                 }
00443         }
00444 
00445         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00446         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00447         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00448                 (*observerIterator)->deleteNode(id);
00449         }
00450 
00451         if (operationSucceeded) {
00452                 return true;
00453         } else {
00454                 return false;
00455         }
00456 }
00457 
00458 bool SceneGraphFacade::addParent(unsigned int id, unsigned int parentId) {
00459         bool operationSucceeded = false;
00460         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(id);
00461         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00462         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpParentNode = findNodeRecerence(parentId);
00463         Node::NodePtr parentNode = tmpParentNode.lock();
00464         Group::GroupPtr parentGroup = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Group>(parentNode);
00465 
00466         if (parentGroup != 0 && node != 0) {
00467                 parentGroup->addChild(node);// TODO shared ref.
00468                 operationSucceeded = true;
00469         }
00470 
00471         /* Call all observers regardless if an error occured or not */
00472         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator;
00473         for (observerIterator = updateObservers.begin(); observerIterator != updateObservers.end(); ++observerIterator) {
00474                 (*observerIterator)->addParent(id, parentId);
00475         }
00476 
00477         if (operationSucceeded) {
00478                 return true;
00479         } else {
00480                 LOG(ERROR) << "Parent with ID " << parentId << " is not a group. Cannot add a new parent-child relation.";
00481                 return false;
00482         }
00483 }
00484 
00485 bool SceneGraphFacade::attachUpdateObserver(ISceneGraphUpdateObserver* observer) {
00486         assert(observer != 0);
00487         updateObservers.push_back(observer);
00488         return true;
00489 }
00490 
00491 bool SceneGraphFacade::detachUpdateObserver(ISceneGraphUpdateObserver* observer) {
00492         assert(observer != 0);
00493         std::vector<ISceneGraphUpdateObserver*>::iterator observerIterator = std::find(updateObservers.begin(), updateObservers.end(), observer);
00494     if (observerIterator!=updateObservers.end()) {
00495         updateObservers.erase(observerIterator);
00496         return true;
00497     }
00498     LOG(ERROR) << "Cannot detach update observer. Provided reference does not match with any in the observers list.";
00499         return false;
00500 }
00501 
00502 bool SceneGraphFacade::executeGraphTraverser(INodeVisitor* visitor, unsigned int subgraphId) {
00503         Node::NodeWeakPtr tmpNode = findNodeRecerence(subgraphId);
00504         Node::NodePtr node = tmpNode.lock();
00505         if (node != 0) {
00506                 node->accept(visitor);
00507                 return true;
00508         }
00509         return false;
00510 }
00511 
00512 Node::NodeWeakPtr SceneGraphFacade::findNodeRecerence(unsigned int id) {
00513         nodeIterator = idLookUpTable.find(id);
00514         if (nodeIterator != idLookUpTable.end()) { //TODO multiple IDs?
00515                 Node::NodePtr tmpNodeHandle = nodeIterator->second.lock();
00516                 if(tmpNodeHandle !=0) {
00517                         assert (id == tmpNodeHandle->getId()); // Otherwise something really went wrong while maintaining IDs...
00518                         return nodeIterator->second;
00519                 }
00520                 LOG(WARNING) << "ID " << id << " seems to be orphaned. Possibly its node has been deleted earlier.";
00521         }
00522         LOG(WARNING) << "Scene graph does not contain a node with ID " << id;
00523         return Node::NodeWeakPtr(); // should be kind of null...
00524 }
00525 
00526 bool SceneGraphFacade::doesIdExist(unsigned int id) {
00527         nodeIterator = idLookUpTable.find(id);
00528         if (nodeIterator != idLookUpTable.end()) {
00529                 return true;
00530         }
00531         return false;
00532 }
